resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The angel forces Adam and Eve out of the Garden of Eden. Adam speaks with the angel; Eve, in a melancholic pose, looks ahead to the right.
resource.chars: The angel forces Adam and Eve out of the Garden of Eden. Adam speaks with the angel; Eve, in a melancholic pose, looks ahead to the right.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The rebel angels are cast out of Heaven while God sits enthroned, the angels turning into insects as they break through the clouds.
resource.chars: The rebel angels are cast out of Heaven while God sits enthroned, the angels turning into insects as they break through the clouds.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">A large wagon of hay surrounded by a multitude of fools engaged in a variety of sins.
resource.chars: A large wagon of hay surrounded by a multitude of fools engaged in a variety of sins.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Adam and Eve find the serpent and the tree; the serpent offers them an apple.
resource.chars: Adam and Eve find the serpent and the tree; the serpent offers them an apple.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: <span style="color: #202122; font-family: sans-serif;">An angel looking to the sky, praying. He is the only one to see Christ looking down on the world.
